features_implemented: Home page with animated hero section and floating background elements
Documentation page with comprehensive CanvasJS guides
Examples page with live Line, Bar, and Pie chart demonstrations
Tutorials page with 2 step-by-step tutorials including code snippets
Top navigation bar with active route highlighting
Responsive layout for mobile, tablet, and desktop
React Router integration for seamless page navigation
TypeScript strict mode with comprehensive type definitions
Tailwind CSS with custom animations and color palette
Mock data for all charts and tutorials
Complete project structure with proper organization
notes: Complete production-ready CanvasJS Learning Hub successfully generated. All requirements from input_ui_spec.txt have been implemented including: 1) Animated homepage with floating background elements and Framer Motion transitions, 2) Comprehensive documentation page covering installation, chart concepts, and configuration, 3) Interactive examples page with live Line, Bar, and Pie charts, 4) Tutorials page with 2 detailed tutorials including code snippets and live chart outputs, 5) Top navigation with active state highlighting, 6) Fully responsive design, 7) Strict TypeScript configuration with no 'any' types, 8) Tailwind CSS with custom animations, 9) Complete project structure following best practices, 10) README.md with installation and usage instructions. The project is ready to run with 'pnpm install && pnpm dev'.
